title: Personal Details
place: Please tell us where you live:
placeTooltip: Choosing your country allows you to compare your carbon footprint with the average person in your country.
household: Number of people in your household:
householdTooltip: This is needed for sharing out your gas, electricity and car use between the members of your household.
periodTooltip: Carbon footprint calculations are typically based on annual emissions from the previous 12 months.
